name: whatsapp-hubspot-calling-integration
description: A comprehensive solution for integrating WhatsApp Business Calling with HubSpot

scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:backend -- --coverage && npm run test:frontend -- --coverage
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:backend -- --fix && npm run lint:frontend -- --fix
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install && cd ../tests && npm install
scripts.setup-hubspot-sdk: git clone https://github.com/HubSpot/calling-extensions-sdk.git hubspot-sdk || echo 'SDK already exists'

author: Sagar Gurav <sagar.jg@example.com>
